1.title: Ediciones Lucentia
1.description: Developed a static website for a publishing house, with the aim of effectively showcasing their services. This site was built to provide an engaging and informative user experience, positioning itself as the key digital presence for commercialization and contact.

2.title: Adventist On The Map
2.description: Developed a public web directory designed for a client to effectively manage and showcase a curated network of Adventist professionals offering various services.

3.title: Profeteia
3.description: Developed and customized an e-commerce and personal blog website for a client selling virtual products. My work focused on setting up the site for a good user experience and content creation, ensuring the client could effectively manage their products and posts.

4.title: The Friends Language Club
4.description: My initial web application project, designed as a platform to connect language learners with native speakers for practice and cultural exchange. This endeavor provided comprehensive hands-on experience in core web development principles, from conceptualization and design to implementation and problem-solving.
